title: Chemistry of Heterocyclic Compounds
additional-note: Volumes of this serial have distinctive titles. Before concluding that other volumes are in the public domain, search for book renewals under their distinctive titles. We have not systematically searched individual issue titles, but we did check the titles for volumes 1 and 2, and found a renewal record for volume 2 (Six-Membered Heterocyclic Nitrogen Compounds With Four Condensed Rings) that did not explicitly mention this serial.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Joe Kishman for copyright research on this title.
